授業目的:
Enabling students' knowledge building and critical thinking on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, as well as the developmental aspects, and global-local impacts of NGOs
Students can use the learning for organizing, and lead, NGOs/ NPOs activities in different settings of a globalizinging world.
到達目標:
Students can make critical analysis on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, and can assess the impacts of NGOs.
Students can work effectively with NGOs activities as organizer, or better, demonstrating leadership, as well as policy analyst.
特記事項: 【合併】N.G.O.（総合政策学部）/非政府組織論（総合政策学部）
関連科目:
Other Courses taught by the Teacher ( O. K. LAI ) and LUNA Link; Teaching References Folders, or plus:

name: 【300】非政府組織論／N.G.O.
担当者: ライ　オン　クォック（LAI ON-KWOK）
成績評価備考:
備考　Note
This Course is taught in ENGLISH Only. Creative contribution showing learning results is expected. In addition to Course Work Report and Assessment; ORAL TEST and Examination in ENGLISH might be taken to Assess Student's Learning and the Notes at 12th, 13th & 14th Classes. Students might be asked to revise and re-submit the Report & Notes of Learning: Additional Oral (in class or online discussions) examination might be conducted. In-Class or Online Test might be conducted to check the progress of learning. Oral Examination / Report Presentation might be conducted to check the written works.
The Final Report has TWO Parts: 1st Part (800-word x 3) and 2nd Part (4000-word) in English
1st Part: 3-Reviews: One Review for 2-Reference/Readings; Another One Review for 2-Videos/YouTube alike.
2nd Part: Answer the Questions (available later) in English 4000-word in English. Interactive Reflexive Review-Learning.
